scripts.sentry-create-release: REACT_APP_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); sentry-cli releases --log-level=debug new -p marketplace-apps $REACT_APP_RELEASE
scripts.sentry-set-commits: REACT_APP_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); sentry-cli releases --log-level=debug set-commits --auto --ignore-missing $REACT_APP_RELEASE
scripts.sentry-upload-source-maps: REACT_APP_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); sentry-cli releases --log-level=debug files $REACT_APP_RELEASE upload-sourcemaps --ext ts --ext tsx --ext map ./src ./build
scripts.sentry-finalize-release: REACT_APP_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); sentry-cli releases --log-level=debug finalize $REACT_APP_RELEASE
scripts.sentry-deploy: REACT_APP_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); sentry-cli releases --log-level=debug deploys $REACT_APP_RELEASE new -e production
scripts.post-deploy: npm run -s sentry-create-release && npm run -s sentry-set-commits && npm run -s sentry-upload-source-maps && npm run -s sentry-finalize-release && npm run -s sentry-deploy
